makelist
<title> [COLOR blue] [makelist.param1][/COLOR] : [COLOR blue] [makelist.param2][/COLOR][COLOR blue]- [makelist.param4][/COLOR] [B] [COLOR blue][makelist.param3][/B] [/COLOR]</title> <link>plugin://program.plexus/?url=[makelist.param5]&mode=1&name=Deportes TvGratis</link>
